title: Tata Comm to acquire Sri Lanka’s Suntel
content: NEW DELHI: Tata Communications (TCL) is set to acquire Sri Lanka’s second-largest land-based telephone company Suntel. TCL (formerly VSNL), which was acquired by the Tatas following the government’s divestment in 2002, has received the approval of the government, which still owns 26% stake in the company, for the proposed acquisition. The Indian firm had submitted…
